mainText:
At times like this there are no words for alleviating pain and longing, but
our hearts are warmed to know that Steve was a good man, an inventor and a
great leader odd. May God comfort the hearts of family, friends and all who
have always had an appreciation and fondness for him.

I learned to program on an Apple II in my first computer course for almost 25
years ago, this little box has made all the difference in my life.

Rest in peace Steve and thanks for everything.
author: Marcelo
